roleset.name: cause to know
roleset.note: INFORM-V NOTES: Member of Vncls advise-37.9, tell-37.2. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from inform.01-v)
INFORMED-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison toinform.01. Inform.01 is a member of VN classes advise-37.9 andtell-37.2. Framed by Katie. (from informed.01-j)

roles.note: INFORMED-J NOTES: This is a direct copy of the verb. 'Informed' will often be tagged as VBN. It should still beannotatedas an adjective. (from informed.01-j)

example.name: inform-v: inform an SBAR
example.text: But a much smaller mutual fund company, the USAA Investment Management Co. unit of USAA, San Antonio, Texas, said it informednine national brokerage firms that it will cease business with themunless they stop index-arbitrage trading.
example.arg: that it will cease business with them unless they stop index-arbitrage trading

example.name: inform-v: inform a wh-clause
example.text: One source familiar with the airline said, however, that [Mr. Corr]-1 wasn't informed *trace*-1 in advance during the summer when Mr. Lorenzo began discussions with potential buyers.
example.arg: when Mr. Lorenzo began discussions with potential buyers

example.name: inform-v: inform of
example.text: During his tenure, [Mr. Corr]-1 attempted through a series ofmeetings *trace*-1 to inform managers of some of the company'sfuture plans, traveled widely to talk to employees and backedtraining sessions designed to improve the carrier's image.
example.arg: of some of the company's future plans

example.name: inform-v: inform about
example.text: [New York authorities]-1, informed *trace*-1 yesterday aboutthe move, reacted with concern and even some anger to the idea ofthe nation's third-largest corporation leaving without giving theman opportunity to accommodate it.

example.name: informed-j: With args 0 and 1
example.text: This patient is well informed from her own research.

example.name: informed-j: with arg 2
example.text: Patient is well informed as to the nature of the procedure
example.arg: as to the nature of the procedure

example.name: informative-j
example.text: ...and Pythagoras' Theorem really is informative about surveyed triangles etc., just as Hooke's Law or Boyle's Law isinformative about everyday elastic substances or gases.
example.arg: just as Hooke's Law or Boyle's Law is informative about everyday elastic substances or gases

roleset.name: disclose confidential information to an authority; be an informant
roleset.note: INFORM-V NOTES: This sense split off from the original .01 roleset by Julia for unification.

example.name: inform-v: args 0, 3
example.text: He informed on his own brother.

example.name: inform-v: args 0, 1, 3
example.text: On one occasion, he informed to the Grand Duke Francesco on two lovers in the Medici household—Eleonora, the wife of Pietro de'Medici, who was having an illicit affair with BernardinoAntinori—and his informing led directly to Eleonora's murder byPietro.
example.arg: on two lovers in the Medici household—Eleonora, the wife of Pietro de' Medici, who was having an illicit affair withBernardino Antinori

example.name: inform-v: arg1-for
example.text: Man says he informed on Muslims for FBI.
